name: Magic Floor
storyline: In this game, you are a boulder, and yesterday you've discovered a hidden underground hall in your magic cellar! At the first glance it appeared to be just empty, but at closer look it turned out to be having a very funny bewitched floor...
summary: A homebrew game released for the SNES, Nintendo SuperDisc (aka Nintendo Play Station), Satellaview and the Nintendo Super System arcade machine.
